t: This Easy-to-Install Kit Turns Your Kettle Grill Into a Pizza Oven
s: August 17, 2023 - With this attachment, your grill ... pizza. KettlePizza is available in several different sizes, but we’re particularly fond of the 22.5-inch model, which weighs less than 7 pounds. It’s designed to fit grills with the same diameter, including the beloved Weber One Touch grill, one of Amazon’s best-reviewed charcoal grills. The company claims that the grill accessory works on virtually any brand, but it was ...
